entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 23 by morning. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h late this evening. Temperature rising to minus 23 by morning. Wind chill minus 39 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 19.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 26 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 08 January 2023
